QuestData.Title: The Emerald Queen
QuestData.Description: $n, you have returned. Good.$b$bI have counseled with the other archdruids and concluded that Cenarius' condition is merely a symptom of a much greater problem. Your experiences in Moonclaw Vale make that clear.$b$bWe need help.$b$bThere is one who can bring understanding to these events. With Thaon gone, we must ask that you aid us in reaching out to the Lady of Dreams.
